AllocateClusterPublicConnection.title: AllocateClusterPublicConnection
AllocateClusterPublicConnection.summary: Applies for a public endpoint for an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

BatchApplyAdviceByIdList.title: BatchApplyAdviceByIdList
BatchApplyAdviceByIdList.summary: Applies multiple optimization suggestions at a time.

BindDBResourceGroupWithUser.title: BindDBResourceGroupWithUser
BindDBResourceGroupWithUser.summary: Associates a resource group of an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster with a database account.

BindDBResourcePoolWithUser.title: BindDBResourcePoolWithUser
BindDBResourcePoolWithUser.summary: Associates a resource group with a database account. You can call this operation only for AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition clusters in elastic mode for Cluster Edition.

CheckServiceLinkedRole.title: CheckServiceLinkedRole
CheckServiceLinkedRole.summary: Checks whether a service-linked role is created.

CreateAccount.title: CreateAccount
CreateAccount.summary: Creates a database account for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

CreateDBCluster.title: CreateDBCluster
CreateDBCluster.summary: Creates an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition cluster.

CreateDBResourceGroup.title: CreateDBResourceGroup
CreateDBResourceGroup.summary: Creates a resource group for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

CreateElasticPlan.title: CreateElasticPlan
CreateElasticPlan.summary: Creates a scheduled scaling plan. This operation can be used only for AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters in elastic mode for Cluster Edition.

DeleteDBCluster.title: DeleteDBCluster
DeleteDBCluster.summary: Deletes an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DeleteDBResourceGroup.title: DeleteDBResourceGroup
DeleteDBResourceGroup.summary: Deletes a resource group from an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

DeleteDBResourcePool.title: DeleteDBResourcePool
DeleteDBResourcePool.summary: Deletes a resource group. You can call this operation only for AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition clusters in elastic mode for Cluster Edition.

DeleteElasticPlan.title: DeleteElasticPlan
DeleteElasticPlan.summary: Deletes a scheduled scaling plan. You can call this operation only for AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition clusters in elastic mode for Cluster Edition.

DescribeAbnormalPatternDetection.title: DescribeAbnormalPatternDetection
DescribeAbnormalPatternDetection.summary: Queries abnormal SQL patterns within a time range.

DescribeAccounts.title: DescribeAccounts
DescribeAccounts.summary: Queries a list of database accounts for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeActiveOperationMaintainConf.title: DescribeActiveOperationMaintainConf
DescribeActiveOperationMaintainConf.summary: Queries the configuration information about O\\\&M tasks.

DescribeActiveOperationTasks.title: DescribeActiveOperationTasks
DescribeActiveOperationTasks.summary: Queries the information about O\&M tasks.

DescribeAdviceServiceEnabled.title: DescribeAdviceServiceEnabled
DescribeAdviceServiceEnabled.summary: Queries whether the suggestion feature is enabled for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeAllAccounts.title: DescribeAllAccounts
DescribeAllAccounts.summary: Queries the information about an account or the list of accounts of a specific database within an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeAllDataSource.title: DescribeAllDataSource
DescribeAllDataSource.summary: Queries a list of databases, tables, and columns in a cluster.

DescribeAppliedAdvices.title: DescribeAppliedAdvices
DescribeAppliedAdvices.summary: Queries the applied optimization suggestions for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeAuditLogConfig.title: DescribeAuditLogConfig
DescribeAuditLogConfig.summary: Queries the SQL audit settings of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeAuditLogRecords.title: DescribeAuditLogRecords
DescribeAuditLogRecords.summary: Queries the SQL audit logs of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeAutoRenewAttribute.title: DescribeAutoRenewAttribute
DescribeAutoRenewAttribute.summary: Queries the auto-renewal status of a subscription AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeAvailableAdvices.title: DescribeAvailableAdvices
DescribeAvailableAdvices.summary: Queries the available suggestions for cluster optimization.

DescribeAvailableResource.title: DescribeAvailableResource
DescribeAvailableResource.summary: Queries the resources of clusters within zones of a region.

DescribeBackupPolicy.title: DescribeBackupPolicy
DescribeBackupPolicy.summary: Queries the backup settings of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeBackups.title: DescribeBackups
DescribeBackups.summary: Queries a list of backup sets for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeBadSqlDetection.title: DescribeBadSqlDetection
DescribeBadSqlDetection.summary: Queries the bad SQL statements that affect cluster stability within a time range.

DescribeColumns.title: DescribeColumns
DescribeColumns.summary: Queries a list of columns in a table within an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeComputeResource.title: DescribeComputeResource
DescribeComputeResource.summary: Queries the specifications of computing resources for AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition clusters within a region.

DescribeConnectionCountRecords.title: DescribeConnectionCountRecords
DescribeConnectionCountRecords.summary: Queries the current number of connections to an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeControllerDetection.title: DescribeControllerDetection
DescribeControllerDetection.summary: Queries the diagnostic results of the access layer.

DescribeDBClusterAccessWhiteList.title: DescribeDBClusterAccessWhiteList
DescribeDBClusterAccessWhiteList.summary: Queries a list of IP address whitelists for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDBClusterAttribute.title: DescribeDBClusterAttribute
DescribeDBClusterAttribute.summary: Queries the information about an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDBClusterHealthStatus.title: DescribeDBClusterHealthStatus
DescribeDBClusterHealthStatus.summary: Queries the health status of an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition cluster.

DescribeDBClusterNetInfo.title: DescribeDBClusterNetInfo
DescribeDBClusterNetInfo.summary: Queries the network information about an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDBClusterPerformance.title: DescribeDBClusterPerformance
DescribeDBClusterPerformance.summary: Queries the performance data of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDBClusterResourcePoolPerformance.title: DescribeDBClusterResourcePoolPerformance
DescribeDBClusterResourcePoolPerformance.summary: Queries the monitoring information about resource groups within an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDBClusterSSL.title: DescribeDBClusterSSL
DescribeDBClusterSSL.summary: Queries the SSL configurations of an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

DescribeDBClusterShardNumber.title: DescribeDBClusterShardNumber
DescribeDBClusterShardNumber.summary: Queries the number of shards in an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDBClusterSpaceSummary.title: DescribeDBClusterSpaceSummary
DescribeDBClusterSpaceSummary.summary: Queries the storage overview information of an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster, such as the total data size, hot data size, cold data size, and data growth.

DescribeDBClusterStatus.title: DescribeDBClusterStatus
DescribeDBClusterStatus.summary: Queries the status of AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition clusters within a region.

DescribeDBClusters.title: DescribeDBClusters
DescribeDBClusters.summary: Queries a list of AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters within a region.

DescribeDBResourceGroup.title: DescribeDBResourceGroup
DescribeDBResourceGroup.summary: Queries the information about a resource group for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDBResourcePool.title: DescribeDBResourcePool
DescribeDBResourcePool.summary: Queries the information about resource groups of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster. You can call this operation only for AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition clusters in elastic mode for Cluster Edition.

DescribeDiagnosisDimensions.title: DescribeDiagnosisDimensions
DescribeDiagnosisDimensions.summary: Queries the deduplicated statistics of SQL statements that meet a condition of the resource group, database, username, and source IP address in an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDiagnosisMonitorPerformance.title: DescribeDiagnosisMonitorPerformance
DescribeDiagnosisMonitorPerformance.summary: Queries the monitoring information about queries within a time range.

DescribeDiagnosisRecords.title: DescribeDiagnosisRecords
DescribeDiagnosisRecords.summary: Queries the diagnostic information about SQL statements that meet a condition in an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeDiagnosisSQLInfo.title: DescribeDiagnosisSQLInfo
DescribeDiagnosisSQLInfo.summary: Queries the execution information about an SQL statement, including the execution plan, execution information, resource usage, and self-diagnostics results.

DescribeDiagnosisTasks.title: DescribeDiagnosisTasks
DescribeDiagnosisTasks.summary: Queries the execution information about distributed tasks in a stage of a query.

DescribeDownloadRecords.title: DescribeDownloadRecords
DescribeDownloadRecords.summary: Queries a list of download tasks for the last five SQL queries of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeEIURange.title: DescribeEIURange
DescribeEIURange.summary: Queries the range for the number of elastic I/O units (EIUs) for an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

DescribeElasticPlan.title: DescribeElasticPlan
DescribeElasticPlan.summary: Queries scaling plans of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster. This operation can be used only for AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters in elastic mode for Cluster Edition.

DescribeExcessivePrimaryKeys.title: DescribeExcessivePrimaryKeys
DescribeExcessivePrimaryKeys.summary: Queries the tables that have excessive primary key fields in an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

DescribeExecutorDetection.title: DescribeExecutorDetection
DescribeExecutorDetection.summary: Queries the diagnostic results of the compute layer.

DescribeHistoryEventsStat.title: DescribeHistoryEventsStat
DescribeHistoryEventsStat.summary: Queries the information about historical events in the event center.

DescribeInclinedNodes.title: DescribeInclinedNodes
DescribeInclinedNodes.summary: Queries the disk usage of all storage nodes.

DescribeInclinedTables.title: DescribeInclinedTables
DescribeInclinedTables.summary: Queries the information about skewed tables for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeKernelVersion.title: DescribeKernelVersion
DescribeKernelVersion.summary: Queries the information about the minor version of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeKmsKeys.title: DescribeKmsKeys
DescribeKmsKeys.summary: Queries a list of Key Management Service (KMS) keys.

DescribeLoadTasksRecords.title: DescribeLoadTasksRecords
DescribeLoadTasksRecords.summary: Queries the information about asynchronous import and export tasks of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeLogHubAttribute.title: DescribeLogHubAttribute
DescribeLogHubAttribute.summary: Queries the information about a log shipping job.

DescribeLogStoreKeys.title: DescribeLogStoreKeys
DescribeLogStoreKeys.summary: Queries a list of log keywords in a Logstore.

DescribeMaintenanceAction.title: DescribeMaintenanceAction
DescribeMaintenanceAction.summary: Queries the information about O\&M events.

DescribeOperatorPermission.title: DescribeOperatorPermission
DescribeOperatorPermission.summary: Queries the details of the permissions granted to the service account of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeOversizeNonPartitionTableInfos.title: DescribeOversizeNonPartitionTableInfos
DescribeOversizeNonPartitionTableInfos.summary: Queries the information about oversized non-partitioned tables in an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribePatternPerformance.title: DescribePatternPerformance
DescribePatternPerformance.summary: Queries the metrics of an SQL pattern such as the query duration and average memory usage within a period of time.

DescribeProcessList.title: DescribeProcessList
DescribeProcessList.summary: Queries the queries that are being executed on a cluster.

DescribeRdsAnalysisResourceQuotas.title: DescribeRdsAnalysisResourceQuotas
DescribeRdsAnalysisResourceQuotas.summary: Queries the information about specifications of MySQL analytic instances.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries a list of available regions and zones for AnalyticDB for MySQL.

DescribeSQAConfig.title: DescribeSQAConfig
DescribeSQAConfig.summary: Queries the short query acceleration (SQA) configuration of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeSQLPatterns.title: DescribeSQLPatterns
DescribeSQLPatterns.summary: Queries a list of SQL patterns for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster within a period of time.

DescribeSQLPlan.title: DescribeSQLPlan
DescribeSQLPlan.summary: Queries the plan information about an SQL statement such as a query statement or an extract-transform-load (ETL) task statement.

DescribeSQLPlanTask.title: DescribeSQLPlanTask
DescribeSQLPlanTask.summary: Queries the information about a task.

DescribeSchemas.title: DescribeSchemas
DescribeSchemas.summary: Queries a list of databases in an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeSqlPattern.title: DescribeSqlPattern
DescribeSqlPattern.summary: Queries a list of SQL patterns for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster within a time range.

DescribeSyncAvailableDBClusterList.title: DescribeSyncAvailableDBClusterList
DescribeSyncAvailableDBClusterList.summary: Queries a list of instances or clusters that are available for data synchronization.

DescribeSyncJobList.title: DescribeSyncJobList
DescribeSyncJobList.summary: Queries a list of synchronization jobs in an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeTableDetail.title: DescribeTableDetail
DescribeTableDetail.summary: Queries the distribution of data in a table among partitions.

DescribeTablePartitionDiagnose.title: DescribeTablePartitionDiagnose
DescribeTablePartitionDiagnose.summary: Queries the information about partition diagnostics.

DescribeTableStatistics.title: DescribeTableStatistics
DescribeTableStatistics.summary: Queries the information about table statistics for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeTables.title: DescribeTables
DescribeTables.summary: Queries a list of tables in a database of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

DescribeTaskInfo.title: DescribeTaskInfo
DescribeTaskInfo.summary: Queries the information about a task.

DescribeVSwitchs.title: DescribeVSwitchs
DescribeVSwitchs.summary: Queries a list of available vSwitches.

DescribeVpcs.title: DescribeVpcs
DescribeVpcs.summary: Queries a list of available virtual private clouds (VPCs).

DescribeWorkerDetection.title: DescribeWorkerDetection
DescribeWorkerDetection.summary: Queries the diagnostic results of the storage layer.

DetachUserENI.title: DetachUserENI
DetachUserENI.summary: Detaches an elastic network interface (ENI) from an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition cluster.

DownloadDiagnosisRecords.title: DownloadDiagnosisRecords
DownloadDiagnosisRecords.summary: Downloads the diagnostic information about SQL statements that meet a condition for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

GetCreateTableSQL.title: GetCreateTableSQL
GetCreateTableSQL.summary: Queries the table creation statement for tables.

GrantOperatorPermission.title: GrantOperatorPermission
GrantOperatorPermission.summary: Grants permissions to the service account of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters, or the AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters that have tags added.

MigrateDBCluster.title: MigrateDBCluster
MigrateDBCluster.summary: Migrates data from a Data Warehouse Edition cluster to a Data Lakehouse Edition or Enterprise Edition cluster in AnalyticDB for MySQL.

ModifyAccountDescription.title: ModifyAccountDescription
ModifyAccountDescription.summary: Modifies the description of a database account for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyActiveOperationMaintainConf.title: ModifyActiveOperationMaintainConf
ModifyActiveOperationMaintainConf.summary: Changes the time configuration of O\\\&M events.

ModifyActiveOperationTasks.title: ModifyActiveOperationTasks
ModifyActiveOperationTasks.summary: Changes the execution time of O\&M events.

ModifyAutoRenewAttribute.title: ModifyAutoRenewAttribute
ModifyAutoRenewAttribute.summary: Modifies the auto-renewal status of a subscription AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyBackupPolicy.title: ModifyBackupPolicy
ModifyBackupPolicy.summary: Modifies the backup policy of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyClusterConnectionString.title: ModifyClusterConnectionString
ModifyClusterConnectionString.summary: Changes the endpoint of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyDBCluster.title: ModifyDBCluster
ModifyDBCluster.summary: Changes the specifications of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyDBClusterAccessWhiteList.title: ModifyDBClusterAccessWhiteList
ModifyDBClusterAccessWhiteList.summary: Modifies the IP address whitelists of a cluster.

ModifyDBClusterDescription.title: ModifyDBClusterDescription
ModifyDBClusterDescription.summary: Modifies the description of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster to facilitate the maintenance and management of the cluster.

ModifyDBClusterMaintainTime.title: ModifyDBClusterMaintainTime
ModifyDBClusterMaintainTime.summary: Changes the maintenance window of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyDBClusterPayType.title: ModifyDBClusterPayType
ModifyDBClusterPayType.summary: Changes the billing method of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyDBClusterResourceGroup.title: ModifyDBClusterResourceGroup
ModifyDBClusterResourceGroup.summary: Modifies the resource group of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyDBClusterSSL.title: ModifyDBClusterSSL
ModifyDBClusterSSL.summary: Modifies the SSL configurations of an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

ModifyDBClusterShardNumber.title: ModifyDBClusterShardNumber
ModifyDBClusterShardNumber.summary: Changes the number of shards for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyDBClusterVip.title: ModifyDBClusterVip
ModifyDBClusterVip.summary: Changes the virtual IP address (VIP) that is used to connect to an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyDBResourceGroup.title: ModifyDBResourceGroup
ModifyDBResourceGroup.summary: Modifies the number of nodes or the query execution mode for a resource group of an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

ModifyDBResourcePool.title: ModifyDBResourcePool
ModifyDBResourcePool.summary: Modifies the resources of a resource group. This operation is available only for AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters in elastic mode for Cluster Edition.

ModifyElasticPlan.title: ModifyElasticPlan
ModifyElasticPlan.summary: Modifies a scheduled scaling plan. This operation can be used only for AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters in elastic mode for Cluster Edition.

ModifyLogBackupPolicy.title: ModifyLogBackupPolicy
ModifyLogBackupPolicy.summary: Modifies the log backup settings of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ModifyLogHubStatus.title: ModifyLogHubStatus
ModifyLogHubStatus.summary: Changes the status of a log shipping job.

ModifyMaintenanceAction.title: ModifyMaintenanceAction
ModifyMaintenanceAction.summary: Changes the switchover time of O\&M events.

ModifySyncJob.title: ModifySyncJob
ModifySyncJob.summary: Modifies the synchronization jobs for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ReleaseClusterPublicConnection.title: ReleaseClusterPublicConnection
ReleaseClusterPublicConnection.summary: Releases the public endpoint of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

ResetAccountPassword.title: ResetAccountPassword
ResetAccountPassword.summary: Resets the password of a database account for an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

RevokeOperatorPermission.title: RevokeOperatorPermission
RevokeOperatorPermission.summary: Revokes permissions from the service account of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Adds tags to an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.

UnbindDBResourceGroupWithUser.title: UnbindDBResourceGroupWithUser
UnbindDBResourceGroupWithUser.summary: Disassociates a resource group of an AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster from a database account.

UnbindDBResourcePoolWithUser.title: UnbindDBResourcePoolWithUser
UnbindDBResourcePoolWithUser.summary: Disassociates a database account from a resource group. This operation can be called only for AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters in elastic mode for Cluster Edition.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes all tags from AnalyticDB for MySQL clusters.

UpgradeKernelVersion.title: UpgradeKernelVersion
UpgradeKernelVersion.summary: Updates the minor version of an AnalyticDB for MySQL cluster.
